description:
Jitsi Meet is an open-source (Apache) WebRTC JavaScript application that uses Jitsi Videobridge to provide high quality, secure and scalable video conferences.


Notable Changes
- Update to electron 39. This drops support for macOS 11. Now macOS 12 is required as a minimum, as Chromium has dropped macOS 11 as well. By @saghul in #1057
- Use new picture-in-picture feature from jitsi-meet (available since 2.0.10710 (2026-01-14)). In case the feature does not work, you need to update your jitsi server to at least 2.0.10710. By @saghul in #1057
Full Changelog: v2025.10.0...v2026.1.0
